intro: Brings you the joy of building miniature interiors and create your own cozy home designs as you want. Simple, relaxing and fun!
description:
Home Deco Builder is a relaxing game about interior decorating and lets you freely create your dream home in seconds! Choose from different room types and decorate your room as you want. Choose from different items ranging from kitchen equipment to curtains or carpets.

Features :
- Decorate four different room sizes with a variety of different items
- Relaxing game experience
- Lets you completely free building/decorating
